title: [Health] Achieving high COVID-19 vaccine coverage levels by summer can prevent millions of cases. New study finds if the United States vaccinates half its population by the summer vs fall, 6.8 million cases could be prevented and $9.8 billion in societal costs could be saved.
[Medicine] Antibody Response to 2-Dose SARS-CoV-2 mRNA Vaccine Series in Solid Organ Transplant Recipients: Results Not Promising
